fb.datatype
Class ASN1

java.lang.Object
  fb.datatype.ASN1

public abstract class ASN1
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class for ASN.1 encoding and decoding.

decodeTag

public static final void decodeTag(java.io.InputStream s,
                                   int tclass,
                                   int tnum)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   FBDataTypeException
Checks the receiver's tag against the tag in the specified InputStream.

Parameters:
s - The InputStream from which to decode the tag.
tclass - The ASN.1 tag class.
tnum - The ASN.1 tag number.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - An I/O error.
FBDataTypeException - A decoding error.

encodeTag

public static final void encodeTag(java.io.OutputStream s,
                                   int tclass,
                                   int tagNum)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Encode the receiver's ASN.1 identifier octets on the specified OutputStream per ISO/IEC 8825-6.2.

Parameters:
s - The OutputStream on which to encode the tag.
tclass - The ASN.1 tag class.
tagNum - The ASN.1 tag number.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - An I/O error occurred.
FBDataTypeException - DATA_TYPE_ERROR - The tag number is negative.

encodeTagNumber

public static final void encodeTagNumber(java.io.OutputStream s,
                                         int tnum,
                                         boolean lastbyte)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
Encode the receiver's ASN.1 tag number recursively on the specified OutputStream per ISO/IEC 8825-6.2.4.2.

Parameters:
s - The output stream for encoding.
tnum - The tag number.
lastbyte - The 7 LSBs of tnum are to be encoded as the final octet.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - An I/O error occurred.
